profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - 6.1.7.1 General - File specification
profile.description: A stream dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParams keys
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A stream dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParams keys
rule.test: F == null && FFilter == null && FDecodeParms == null

error.message: A stream object dictionary contains one of the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys
